title: Henkel in Talks With Wendel to Acquire Chemical Maker Stahl
description: Henkel AG is in talks with French investment firm Wendel SE on a potential acquisition of Dutch chemical maker Stahl Holdings BV.
content: Henkel AG is in talks with French investment firm Wendel SE on a potential acquisition of Dutch chemical maker Stahl Holdings BV.
